text:
Douglas C. Emhoff (born October 13, 1964) is an American entertainment lawyer. He is set to become the Second Gentleman of the United States, the first to do so. He is the husband of Vice President-elect of the United States Kamala Harris.
He is also the first Jewish spouse to a United States Vice President.
Emhoff is an entertainment litigator and began his career at Pillsbury Winthrop’s litigation group.
Emhoff is now employed by DLA Piper, working at their Washington, D.C. and California offices.

annotations.surface_form: Second Gentleman of the United States
